snp3.12:724: "Ye dukkhaṁ nappajānanti,atho dukkhassa sambhavaṁ;Yattha ca sabbaso dukkhaṁ,asesaṁ uparujjhati;Tañca maggaṁ na jānanti,dukkhūpasamagāminaṁ.
snp3.12:725: Cetovimuttihīnā te,Atho paññāvimuttiyā;Abhabbā te antakiriyāya,Te ve jātijarūpagā.
snp3.12:726: Ye ca dukkhaṁ pajānanti,atho dukkhassa sambhavaṁ;Yattha ca sabbaso dukkhaṁ,asesaṁ uparujjhati;Tañca maggaṁ pajānanti,dukkhūpasamagāminaṁ.
snp3.12:727: Cetovimuttisampannā,Atho paññāvimuttiyā;Bhabbā te antakiriyāya,Na te jātijarūpagāti.
snp3.12:728: "Upadhinidānā pabhavanti dukkhā,Ye keci lokasmimanekarūpā;Yo ve avidvā upadhiṁ karoti,Punappunaṁ dukkhamupeti mando;Tasmā pajānaṁ upadhiṁ na kayirā,Dukkhassa jātippabhavānupassīti.
snp3.12:730: Avijjā hāyaṁ mahāmoho,Yenidaṁ saṁsitaṁ ciraṁ;Vijjāgatā ca ye sattā,Na te gacchanti punabbhavanti.
snp3.12:731: "Yaṁ kiñci dukkhaṁ sambhoti,sabbaṁ saṅkhārapaccayā;Saṅkhārānaṁ nirodhena,natthi dukkhassa sambhavo.
snp3.12:732: Etamādīnavaṁ ñatvā,dukkhaṁ saṅkhārapaccayā;Sabbasaṅkhārasamathā,saññānaṁ uparodhanā;Evaṁ dukkhakkhayo hoti,etaṁ ñatvā yathātathaṁ.
snp3.12:733: Sammaddasā vedaguno,Sammadaññāya paṇḍitā;Abhibhuyya mārasaṁyogaṁ,Na gacchanti punabbhavanti.
snp3.12:734: "Yaṁ kiñci dukkhaṁ sambhoti,Sabbaṁ viññāṇapaccayā;Viññāṇassa nirodhena,Natthi dukkhassa sambhavo.
snp3.12:737: Ye ca phassaṁ pariññāya,Aññāyupasame ratā;Te ve phassābhisamayā,Nicchātā parinibbutāti.
snp3.12:738: "Sukhaṁ vā yadi vā dukkhaṁ,Adukkhamasukhaṁ saha;Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca,Yaṁ kiñci atthi veditaṁ.
snp3.12:739: Etaṁ dukkhanti ñatvāna,Mosadhammaṁ palokinaṁ;Phussa phussa vayaṁ passaṁ,Evaṁ tattha vijānati;Vedanānaṁ khayā bhikkhu,Nicchāto parinibbutoti.
snp3.12:741: Etamādīnavaṁ ñatvā,Taṇhaṁ dukkhassa sambhavaṁ;Vītataṇho anādāno,Sato bhikkhu paribbajeti.
snp3.12:742: "Upādānapaccayā bhavo,Bhūto dukkhaṁ nigacchati;Jātassa maraṇaṁ hoti,Eso dukkhassa sambhavo.
snp3.12:743: Tasmā upādānakkhayā,Sammadaññāya paṇḍitā;Jātikkhayaṁ abhiññāya,Na gacchanti punabbhavanti.
snp3.12:744: "Yaṁ kiñci dukkhaṁ sambhoti,Sabbaṁ ārambhapaccayā;Ārambhānaṁ nirodhena,Natthi dukkhassa sambhavo.
snp3.12:747: "Yaṁ kiñci dukkhaṁ sambhoti,Sabbaṁ āhārapaccayā;Āhārānaṁ nirodhena,Natthi dukkhassa sambhavo.
snp3.12:749: Ārogyaṁ sammadaññāya,Āsavānaṁ parikkhayā;Saṅkhāya sevī dhammaṭṭho,Saṅkhyaṁ nopeti vedagūti.
snp3.12:750: "Yaṁ kiñci dukkhaṁ sambhoti,Sabbaṁ iñjitapaccayā;Iñjitānaṁ nirodhena,Natthi dukkhassa sambhavo.
snp3.12:751: Etamādīnavaṁ ñatvā,Dukkhaṁ iñjitapaccayā;Tasmā hi ejaṁ vossajja,Saṅkhāre uparundhiya;Anejo anupādāno,Sato bhikkhu paribbajeti.
snp3.12:753: Etamādīnavaṁ ñatvā,Nissayesu mahabbhayaṁ;Anissito anupādāno,Sato bhikkhu paribbajeti.
snp3.12:754: "Ye ca rūpūpagā sattā,Ye ca arūpaṭṭhāyino;Nirodhaṁ appajānantā,Āgantāro punabbhavaṁ.
snp3.12:755: Ye ca rūpe pariññāya,Arūpesu asaṇṭhitā;Nirodhe ye vimuccanti,Te janā maccuhāyinoti.
snp3.12:756: "Anattani attamāniṁ,Passa lokaṁ sadevakaṁ;Niviṭṭhaṁ nāmarūpasmiṁ,Idaṁ saccanti maññati.
snp3.12:757: Yena yena hi maññanti,Tato taṁ hoti aññathā;Tañhi tassa musā hoti,Mosadhammañhi ittaraṁ.
snp3.12:758: Amosadhammaṁ nibbānaṁ,Tadariyā saccato vidū;Te ve saccābhisamayā,Nicchātā parinibbutāti.
snp3.12:759: "Rūpā saddā rasā gandhā,Phassā dhammā ca kevalā;Iṭṭhā kantā manāpā ca,Yāvatatthīti vuccati.
snp3.12:760: Sadevakassa lokassa,Ete vo sukhasammatā;Yattha cete nirujjhanti,Taṁ nesaṁ dukkhasammataṁ.
snp3.12:762: Yaṁ pare sukhato āhu,Tadariyā āhu dukkhato;Yaṁ pare dukkhato āhu,Tadariyā sukhato vidū.
snp3.12:763: Passa dhammaṁ durājānaṁ,Sampamūḷhetthaviddasu;Nivutānaṁ tamo hoti,Andhakāro apassataṁ.Satañca vivaṭaṁ hoti,Āloko passatāmiva;Santike na vijānanti,Magā dhammassa kovidā.
snp3.12:765: Ko nu aññatra mariyehi,Padaṁ sambuddhumarahati;Yaṁ padaṁ sammadaññāya,Parinibbanti anāsavā"ti.
